mapper.insert: insert into ftp_vol_board( user_no, title, content) values( #{owner.no}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: select b.vol_board_no, b.title, b.created_dt, b.view_cnt, f.filepath, u.id owner_id from ftp_vol_board b left outer join ftp_vol_board_file f on b.vol_board_no=f.vol_board_no inner join ftp_user u on b.user_no=u.user_no order by b.vol_board_no desc

select b.vol_board_no, b.title, b.created_dt, b.view_cnt, f.filepath, u.id owner_id, count(l.user_no) likeCount from ftp_vol_board b left outer join ftp_vol_board_file f on b.vol_board_no=f.vol_board_no inner join ftp_user u on b.user_no=u.user_no inner join ftp_vol_board_like l on b.vol_board_no=l.vol_board_no where b.vol_board_no=#{values}
select count(c.user_no) from ftp_vol_board_like c inner join ftp_vol_board b on c.vol_board_no=b.vol_board_no where b.vol_board_no=#{values}

select b.vol_board_no, b.title, b.content, b.created_dt, b.view_cnt, f.filepath, u.id owner_id from ftp_vol_board b left outer join ftp_vol_board_file f on b.vol_board_no=f.vol_board_no inner join ftp_user u on b.user_no=u.user_no
title like concat('%', #{value}, '%')
or content like concat('%', #{value}, '%')
or id like concat('%', #{value}, '%')
order by b.vol_board_no desc

select b.vol_board_no, b.title, b.content, b.created_dt, b.view_cnt, f.filepath, u.id owner_id from ftp_vol_board b left outer join ftp_vol_board_file f on b.vol_board_no=f.vol_board_no inner join ftp_user u on b.user_no=u.user_no where b.vol_board_no=#{no}
mapper.update: update ftp_vol_board set view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 where vol_board_no=#{no}
mapper.delete: delete from ftp_vol_board_like where user_no=${param1} and vol_board_no=#{param2}
